Text.Page: <PCNAME>! Can I ask you a favor? I need someone tough and fast.<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"Why? What's happening?"</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>

I need reports from our field teams.

None of them are far away, but when they send runners back here, they usually arrive half-dead and smelling of sloth. No, really.

Can you stop by each team in the course of your other work?
Anyone who would run that route is either brave or foolish.
I was going to turn this report in myself, but I'm deeply grateful I don't have to, friend.

{@LinkCreature:230#1005$$Naisas} is running us ragged.

I think he wants to get out of the field and back to town. Personally, I enjoy field work!
Careful of that edge! Here's my report. Tell {@LinkCreature:230#1005$$Naisas} the towers are amazing!

Superb work, and quickly done.

Furthermore, you have fewer sloth bites than the usual messenger.
